titles.title: To require reports on the management of Arlington National Cemetery.
To require reports on the management of Arlington National Cemetery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of the Army to submit to specified congressional committees: (1) a one-time report on the management and oversight of contracts at Arlington National Cemetery, requiring, among other things, certain information concerning burial operations and errors in burials; and (2) biennial reports on the execution of and compliance with Army Directive 2010-04, Enhancing the Operations and Oversight of the Army National Cemeteries Program.
